metadata.title: CVE-2024-38561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:kunit: Fix kthread referenceThere is a race condition when a kthread finishes after the deadline andbefore the call to kthread_stop(), which may lead to use after free.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
